alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 8:54AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Polk, northeastern Madison, southeastern Dallas and northern Warren Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 854 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Merle Hay Mall, or over Johnston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Saylorville, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center and Des Moines Int`l Airport around 900 AM CDT. Des Moines, Ankeny, Iowa Events Center and Principal Park around 905 AM CDT. Iowa State Fairgrounds and Southridge Mall around 910 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Altoona, Pleasant Hill, Carlisle, Bondurant, Prairie Meadows, Adventureland Amusement Park and Mitchellville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 64 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 93. Interstate 80 between mile markers 117 and 149. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
